Bosa eIDLink

General

eIDLink developed by BOSA provides browser extensions + a native app to enable BOSA DSS services for your Belgian eID card in a safe and user friendly way.

eIDLink is supported starting from MAC OS X 10.10 Yosemite

Installation

If multiple users have a benefit for using eIDLink, please select to install for all users. You need admin rights to install for all users.
eIDLink will only be active for other users after a reboot of the system. Only for the current user, eIDLink will be active directly after installation.

Smartcard readers

In order to use a smartcard reader on your system, you need to use a CCID compliant reader or install the necessary drivers for your reader. Zetes provides drivers for Zetes readers on following link: http://belgeid.be

Uninstall

This installation image also contains an uninstall pkg that removes eIDLink from your applications.
